txt.en: Your sigil of fire burns exceptionally hot, wounding enemies around your target.

When a target is afflicted with Burning Embers, your Wizard's Fire will fix it in place, causing it to re-apply or tier up over time - continuously reapplying or tiering up Burning Embers each time Wizard's Fire pulses.
Whether or not it tiers up is governed by your Dry Kindling trait.
